operations.summary: Get a list of totals and reports for a single committee.
operations.notes: The numbers in the financial summaries come from form 3 for House and Senate committees, form 3p for presidential committees and form 3x for parties and PACs.

parameters.description: A single committee's reports and cycle totals. This will be slightly faster that using committee_id as a filter but, only one committee_id is accepted per call.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to display or * for all.

api_version.description: Version of API that produced this response

results.description: A list of totals for a single committee

summary.description: Totals and reports for a single committee

committee_id.description: The committee these reports and totals refer to

aggregate_contributions_personal_funds_p.description: Aggregate amount contributed from personal funds - primary (Form 3 -- BCRA Millionaire's Amendment  ruled unconstitutional Davis v FEC) [House/Senate]

all_loans_received_period.description: All loans received during the period. [PAC/Party]

all_loans_received_year.description: All loans received for the year to date. [PAC/Party]

all_other_loans_period.description: All other loans during the period. [House/Senate]

all_other_loans_year.description: All other loans for the year to date. [House/Senate]

beginning_image_number.description: Image number of the first page of the filing. [Presidential, House/Senate, PAC/Party]

candidate_contribution_year.description: Candidate contribution for the year to date. [Presidential]

candidate_contributions_year.description: Candidate contributions for the year to date. [House/Senate]

cash_on_hand_beginning_calendar_year.description: Cash on hand at the beginning of the calendar year. [PAC/Party]

cash_on_hand_close_year.description: Cash on hand close for the year to date. [PAC/Party]

cash_on_hand_end_period.description: Cash on hand end during the period. [Presidential, House/Senate, PAC/Party]

contributions.description: The sum of all total_contributions_period reported for the election cycle. [Presidential, House/Senate,     PAC/Party]

debts_owed_to_committee.description: Total of all the debts owed to a committee. [Presidential, House/Senate, PAC/Party]

disbursements.description: The sum of all total_disbursements_period reported for the election cycle. [Presidential, House/Senate,     PAC/Party]

election_cycle.description: The four-digit year for the two-year election cycle. [Presidential, House/Senate, PAC/Party]

end_image_number.description: The image number of the last page of the filing. [Presidential, House/Senate, PAC/Party]

exempt_legal_accounting_disbursement_yea.description: Exempt legal accounting disbursement for the year to date. [Presidential]

expire_date.description: If the treasurer, custodian of records, etc., changes, then the current record is expired and the new   record is loaded. This is the date the record was updated and no longer up to date. [Presidential, House/Senate, PAC  /Party]

expire_dateload_date.description: The date the report was recorded in the database. [Presidential, House/Senate, PAC/Party]
